title: Campus Maintenance
body: The main library will be closed on Friday for scheduled maintenance. Study spaces will be available in Building C.
content: The university library will be undergoing network and HVAC maintenance on Friday from 8:00 AM to 4:00 PM. Please plan accordingly and use alternative study spaces.

title: Career Fair
body: Join the Spring Career Fair on April 5th at the Student Center.
content: Over 60 employers will be onsite from 10:00 AM to 3:00 PM. Bring printed resumes. Register via the Career Services portal.

title: Deadline Reminder
content: Be sure to finalize your Spring registration by 11:59 PM on March 30th to avoid late fees.
